languages.text: Рандеву, назначенное ксеносом, оказалось ловушкой. Необходимо немедленно вернуться на Даргонус с целью перегруппировки и прояснения текущей позиции.
The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.
languages.original_text: Рандеву, назначенное ксеносом, оказалось ловушкой. Необходимо немедленно вернуться на Даргонус с целью перегруппировки и прояснения текущей позиции.

traits.locale_text: The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.
The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.
The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.
The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.

languages.text: 异形指定的决斗地点是个陷阱。行商浪人必须立刻返回达戈努斯，重新组织军队，将局势控制在手中。
languages.original_text: The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.

traits.locale_text: 异形指定的决斗地点是个陷阱。行商浪人必须立刻返回达戈努斯，重新组织军队，将局势控制在手中。

languages.text: 異種族が指定した待ち合わせ場所は罠だった。自由開拓者は直ちにダルゴナスに戻り、部隊を再編成して状況を解明しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.

traits.locale_text: 異種族が指定した待ち合わせ場所は罠だった。自由開拓者は直ちにダルゴナスに戻り、部隊を再編成して状況を解明しなければならない。

languages.text: El punto de encuentro que establecieron los xenos ha resultado ser una trampa. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe volver a Dargonus de inmediato para reagruparse y aclarar la situación.
languages.original_text: The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.

traits.locale_text: El punto de encuentro que establecieron los xenos ha resultado ser una trampa. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe volver a Dargonus de inmediato para reagruparse y aclarar la situación.

languages.text: Der von den Xenos eingegebene Treffpunkt hat sich als Falle entpuppt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss sofort nach Dargonus zurückkehren, um sich neu zu formieren und die Situation zu bereinigen.
languages.original_text: The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.

traits.locale_text: Der von den Xenos eingegebene Treffpunkt hat sich als Falle entpuppt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss sofort nach Dargonus zurückkehren, um sich neu zu formieren und die Situation zu bereinigen.

languages.text: Le lieu de rencontre fixé par les xénos était un piège. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit revenir immédiatement à Dargonus pour faire le point sur la situation.
languages.original_text: The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.

traits.locale_text: Le lieu de rencontre fixé par les xénos était un piège. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit revenir immédiatement à Dargonus pour faire le point sur la situation.

languages.text: Zenoların belirlediği buluşma noktasının tuzak olduğu ortaya çıktı. Hür Tacir, emrindekilerle bir araya gelmek ve neler olduğunu açığa kavuşturmak için bir an önce Dargonus'a dönmeli.
languages.original_text: The rendezvous point set by the xenos turned out to be a trap. The Rogue Trader must return to Dargonus immediately to regroup and clarify the situation.

traits.locale_text: Zenoların işaretlediği randevu noktasının bir tuzak olduğu ortaya çıktı. Hür Tacir emrindekilerle bir araya gelmek ve durumu netleştirmek için bir an önce Dargonus'a dönmeli.
